Text: It is fantastic!!! THX for torrent!!!

Muito obrigado!!  If Bolton Wanderers get a win against Everton today my Saturday shall be complete.  Kalima!   Quando Quango!   Tunes that I would never have got around to converting from vinyl and such good track selections too (though a few Wake singles would be nice ; ) x
this is the mutts nuts. thanks man, youve made me dust off my raving boots.
I agree!...this IS the MUTTS NUTS!...Thanks.
This music takes me back to a time in music history that I love & miss...

Thanks very much for publishing this. I'm very familiar with the big names of 'Factory Records' (Joy Division, Happy Mondays, OMD etc.) but wanted to listen to some of the lesser known acts that you have generously included. :).
This torrent f-ing rules!!!  Thanks for the retrospective.  Very balanced and good form.

Just going to add a few links to the more obscure artists if I may...
